author: gumb00
content:
Regarding validating "top-level" initcontainers at deploy time instead of at CREATE3: so this helps only with top-level CREATE3 (which may be not top-level frame call-stack-wise), if there's nested CREATE3 inside initcontainer, it will still need to validate at runtime, right?

It means context-dependent behaviour of CREATE3, and I'm not sure how it would know if it's top-level or not, call stack depth doesn't help. Global "initcode" flag needed?
